snippet.title: Sonic: Fan Games/Hacks 468: Sonic 3 & Knuckles: Deluxe (SAGE2005)
snippet.description:
(These are my simple game play videos)
(I can and will remove specific videos if its necessary/requested)

Name: Sonic 3 & Knuckles: Deluxe - SAGE2005
Credit: RedChaosX & Sonic Reality (Hellfire Productions)
Release Date: July 5th, 2005

My Website: https://scaleyfoxy.weebly.com/

Download: Only on Site.

00:00 - Lave Reef Zone Act 2

NOTES: Now I know what you are thinking... With a title like that this better be good!
Well... Unfortunately not really.
This is mostly just a short Demo of Lava Reef Act 2 with no end goal or Badniks.
A secret or two and some odd blocks that can kill you if you try hard enough.
So what's the deal with this one?
Well it was mostly a 2 Man project that intended to have Grinding.
Super & Hyper Forms, New Sprites, Evolutions, Chaos Garden and 2-Player Battles.
But as we see here it did not really make it that far.
I belive Hellfire was better known for their somewhat interesting but no longer existing Website.
Think their main interest was more on Chao Garden stuff or Chao Lifeforms in general.
Otherwise that's about it for this Demo.
